Class P12SignatureEngiine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberneid.disigon.sdk.P12SignatureEngiine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignatureEngine

    public class P12SignatureEngiine
extends java.lang.Object
implements SignatureEngine
    P12SignatureEngiine This class implements a signature engine based upon a PKCS#12 file

    UgoChirico

        public boolean wantsDigestInfo()

        Description copied from interface: SignatureEngine
